mapper.sql: id, title, description, price, stock, product_id, created_at, updated_at
mapper.insert: insert into sku (title, description, price, stock, product_id, created_at, updated_at) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

title,

updated_at,

mapper.update:
update sku
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
stock = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
